frontmatter.title: The Heiress: Julia Newberry
frontmatter.text: Beginning at age 16, Julia Newberry wrote in her diary about life as a member of Chicago’s upper class in the late 1860s. Her idyllic Northside home life ended abruptly with the devastation of the Great Chicago Fire in 1871.
frontmatter.shorttext: Celebrate Chicago’s high society and witness the destruction of the Great Chicago Fire.
